labor.description: 1 Supervising Editor for 65 weeks, 1 Editor for 52 weeks, and 3 Assistant Editors for 52 weeks at high-end 1960s rates.

facility.description: Rental of 2 cutting rooms and regular screening room access at a major studio lot for the duration of the edit.

equipment.description: Rental of Moviola/Steenbeck flatbeds, splicers, viewers, and synchronization equipment.

stock.description: Costs for physical 35mm workprint film, magnetic sound stock, and splicing supplies.

slitScanPhotography.description: 25 complex Stargate sequence shots including R&D for custom slit-scan rig.

modelPhotography.description: 40 complex model shots (Discovery, Orion, etc.) with R&D for pioneering motion control systems.

opticalEffects.description: Over 100 complex optical compositing passes, rotoscoping, and matte paintings over a 30-week period.

frontProjection.description: 35 front projection shots for 'Dawn of Man' sequence including custom large-format rig build and Scotchlite screen.

supervision.description: Dedicated VFX supervision team for the entire multi-year post-production duration.

dialogue.description: Extensive dialogue editing, 25% ADR for clarity, and special processing for HAL 9000 voice.

soundEffects.description: Revolutionary sound design including creation of a custom library for space ambiances and effects.

foley.description: High-complexity foley for prop interactions, character movements, and space suit sounds.

music.description: A-list composer fee, recording sessions with a full orchestra, extensive licensing for iconic classical music, and music editing.

mixing.description: Final mix on a high-end stage for the pioneering 6-track stereo format, including multiple re-recording mixers.

timing.description: Specialized color timer labor for matching complex VFX shots and creating final 35mm and 70mm timings.

labServices.description: Extensive lab work at Technicolor for processing dailies, VFX elements, interpositives, internegatives, and answer prints.

technicalServices.description: Special processes for 65mm to 70mm blow-up and creating elements for Cinerama projection.

masters.description: Creation of the final 65mm Interpositive (IP), Internegative (IN), and 6-track magnetic sound masters.

prints.description: Manufacturing of 50 70mm roadshow prints and 200 35mm theatrical prints for initial distribution.

international.description: Creation of a comprehensive Music & Effects (M&E) track and subtitling for 15 languages.

archive.description: Creation of long-term archival protection masters, including black and white separation masters.
